Name: The Amazing Shrinking Giraffe
About the game: Your name is Ginger, the amazing shrinking giraffe. The Universe has been overrun by evil serpents. You must kill shrink the serpents and trap them in atoms from whence they came. Your adventure takes you from the size of a galaxy to the size of a leaf cell. But beware! When the serpents are angered the hunter becomes the hunted! Explore space in your spaceship, drive around on planets, and get energy from alien creatures and plants. Ride on the back of giant sand worms, or shrink down and ride on the back of beetles. Grow to the size of a planet and jump between asteroids. This is a short experimental type game with an added sandbox component.
